Question: Who was sworn in as the Chief Minister of Maharashtra following the assembly elections in late 2024?
Explanation: Devendra Fadnavis of the BJP took oath as the Chief Minister of Maharashtra for the third time in December 2024, leading the Mahayuti alliance.

Question: In the Maharashtra government formed in December 2024, who were appointed as the Deputy Chief Ministers?

Options.text: Radhakrishna Vikhe Patil and Hasan Mushrif

Question: What is the name of the scheme launched by the Maharashtra government to provide an annual financial benefit to farmers, supplementing the PM-KISAN scheme?

Options.text: Namo Shetkari Maha Samman Nidhi Yojana

CorrectAnswer: Namo Shetkari Maha Samman Nidhi Yojana

Question: Which portfolio was allocated to Ajit Pawar in the Maharashtra cabinet formed in December 2024?

Question: The Maharashtra government announced the development of 'Third Mumbai', a new planned city, around which major infrastructure project?

Question: Who from Maharashtra was honoured with the Dronacharya Award for coaching in Shooting at the National Sports Awards 2024?

Question: The 'Lek Ladki' scheme, launched by the Maharashtra government, provides financial assistance for which purpose?

Higher education abroad for meritorious girl students
Supporting a girl child from birth till the age of 18

Question: What is the primary goal of the 'Majhi Vasundhara Abhiyan' (My Earth Campaign) run by the Maharashtra Government?

Encouraging local bodies to take action on environmental conservation

CorrectAnswer: Encouraging local bodies to take action on environmental conservation

Question: The upcoming deep-water Vadhavan Port, a project of national importance, is being developed in which district of Maharashtra?

Question: Para-athlete Sachin Sarjerao Khilari, who won the Arjuna Award in 2024, is associated with which sport?

Question: What is the primary objective of the 'Mukhyamantri Vayoshri Yojana' launched in Maharashtra?

Offering higher interest rates on savings for senior citizens
Providing financial aid to senior citizens for age-related assistive devices
Building old age homes in every district

CorrectAnswer: Providing financial aid to senior citizens for age-related assistive devices

Question: In the new Maharashtra cabinet, who has been appointed as the Minister of Industries?

Question: According to the Economic Survey of Maharashtra, what was the state's projected GSDP (Gross State Domestic Product) growth rate for 2024-25?

Question: Who has been appointed as the new State Election Commissioner of Maharashtra in January 2025?

Question: The 'Aapla Dawakhana' (Our Clinic) initiative by the Maharashtra government aims to provide:

CorrectAnswer: Accessible primary healthcare in urban areas

Question: Which social worker and educator from Maharashtra was posthumously awarded the Padma Shri in 2025?

Question: Who has been assigned the important portfolio of Revenue in the Maharashtra Government's 2024 cabinet?

Question: The first underground metro line in Mumbai, which recently became fully operational, connects which two areas?

Question: Which scheme was launched in Maharashtra to provide financial aid to women entrepreneurs to start their own businesses?

Options.text: Punyashlok Ahilya Devi Holkar Women Start-Up Scheme

CorrectAnswer: Punyashlok Ahilya Devi Holkar Women Start-Up Scheme

Question: Pankaja Munde has been allocated which key portfolio in the 2024 Maharashtra cabinet?

Question: Shooter Swapnil Kusale from Maharashtra won which prestigious sports award in 2024?

Question: What is the name of the new scheme in Maharashtra that provides a stipend of up to Rs. 10,000 to students?

Options.text: Swami Vivekananda Youth Health Card Scheme

Question: Who has been appointed as the Minister for Public Health and Family Welfare in the new Maharashtra cabinet?
Explanation: Prakashrao Abitkar of the Shiv Sena was given the responsibility of the Ministry of Public Health and Family Welfare.

Question: The 'Shivbhojan Thali' scheme, which provides subsidized meals, continues to be implemented by the Maharashtra government. What is the price of a thali for the common citizen?

Question: The government has established the 6th State Finance Commission in Maharashtra. What is the primary role of this commission?

To decide the annual budget of the state
To review the financial position of Panchayats and Municipalities
To manage the state's debt and borrowings

CorrectAnswer: To review the financial position of Panchayats and Municipalities

Question: What is the name of ISRO's mission to demonstrate in-space docking technology, involving two satellites?
Explanation: The Space Docking Experiment (SPADEX) is a mission by ISRO designed to test and demonstrate the technologies required for rendezvous, docking, and undocking of two spacecraft in orbit.

Question: According to recent economic data, India surpassed which country to become the world's 4th-largest economy?
Explanation: In 2025, reports confirmed that India's nominal GDP had overtaken Japan's, making India the fourth-largest economy in the world after the USA, China, and Germany.

Question: The joint military exercise 'Dharma Guardian 2025' was conducted between India and which other country?

Question: Who has been appointed as the new Chief of the Army Staff in 2025?

Options.text: Lt. Gen. N. S. Raja Subramani

Question: What is the primary objective of the 'PM Surya Ghar: Muft Bijli Yojana' launched in 2024?

Options.text: To provide free electricity to all households
To electrify all remaining unelectrified villages
To promote rooftop solar power generation for households

Question: Who has been appointed as the first-ever female Director General of the Railway Protection Force (RPF)?

First cable-stayed road bridge in the Himalayas

Question: What is 'Prachand', which was recently in the news in the context of the Indian armed forces?
Explanation: Prachand is India's first indigenous multi-role combat helicopter, designed and manufactured by Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL) for the Indian Army and Indian Air Force.

Question: The Government of India has launched the 'Anuvadini' app for what purpose?

Options.text: To track nutritional data for children
To provide real-time translation of educational content into Indian languages

To book appointments in government hospitals

To create 1 crore women entrepreneurs in urban areas

CorrectAnswer: To train women in Self-Help Groups to earn a sustainable income of at least Rs 1 lakh per annum

Building new private schools in rural areas

Question: In which city did India secure the hosting rights for the 2030 Commonwealth Games?

Question: Who is the current Chief of Defence Staff (CDS) of India?

Question: Who has been appointed as the new chairman of the National Commission for Scheduled Castes (NCSC)?

Question: What is 'Swarved Mahamandir', which was inaugurated in Varanasi in late 2024?
